imageprocessing: 1. stable operational temperature without TEC, starting time less than 4 seconds 2. SDE digital image processing 3. 10 pseudo color and B/W, B/W inverse 4. AGC 5. 2X digital amplification
resolution: 336×256 pixel, 25Hz, (640X480 optional, detection distance up to 10km)
interface: 1. RS-485 ( PELCO D protocol, baud rate 2400bps ) ,RS-232 ( optional ) 2. Remote OSD setting 3. PAL/NTSC 4. AC24V/DC12V 5. Waterproof connector
